title: Complete New Hire Paperwork
description: A new hire needs to complete their I-9 and W-4 forms before their first day.

tasks.description: Identify the new hire in the HRIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the new employee's record.

tasks.description: Send the new hire a link to the onboarding portal to complete their paperwork electronically.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the welcome email with the portal link.

tasks.description: Verify that all forms have been completed and submitted correctly in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the portal and confirms that the I-9 and W-4 are complete.
